items.sentence: Tom is looking for someone to help him translate a document from French into English.
Tom Jackson\'s new novel is very well written and I\'m sure you\'ll enjoy reading it.
I had to attend a meeting so I couldn\'t make it in time to pick Tom up after school.
The police weren\'t able to determine which one of the twins had committed the crime.
Tom and I are good friends now, but there was a time when we didn\'t like each other.
Even though Tom has a very demanding job, he always makes time for Mary and the kids.
Tom believes it\'s absolutely necessary to drink at least a liter of water every day.
Tom claimed that the contract was invalid because he\'d been coerced into signing it.
Tom claims he doesn\'t watch much TV, but he watches more than three hours every day.
Tom clearly hopes that Mary won\'t notice that he broke one of her expensive teacups.
